original_metadata.paper_title: Multivariate Simulation-based Forecasting for Intraday Power Markets: Modelling Cross-Product Price Effects
original_metadata.table_caption: Table 2:Specification of the Boolean variables related to the single intraday coupling SIDC. The opening of the cross-border order books happens at 18:00 and 22:00 hours for all delivery periods of the following day. However, the closure of cross-border order books is relative to the delivery time. Hence we need to count backwards in the trading time, takingT−t𝑇𝑡T-titalic_T - italic_tfor variables related to the closure of SIDC.
